attributes.action: Increase security at airports by placing battalions of the British Army to decrease terrorist attacks on planes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think my title says it all really but on a more serious note, terrorism is at its peak, and it is having a knock on affect on racism and racial crimes. By having Army personnel close at hand we can hopefully decrease terrorism on planes. we need to stop terrorism before we have another 9/11 or 7/7 or even all out war on muslims and the middle east. we need it to stop. it must stop for the sake of the families of people who have died. it is necessary to increase security to protect the british public and to put a stop to this war of terror. once and for all
